channel.title: Google on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Introduction

item.title: Analyzing movement behavior in the UK
item.description: Google’s Covid Data Just taking some time out writing my dissertation to do a little bit of data viz and writing before getting back into it! I came across some data released by Google which has been around for a while. They provide insight into the trends of the movement of Android phone users who have opted-in to their data being collected. For the UK, the data is aggregated at the County level so we can who’s been good and social distancing at home and who’s been naughty and gathering in the parks during lockdown.
